job_title: Ministry Resource Advocate in Richmond, BC
pros: Working with Awana has been awesome! I've been able to work on a wide range of projects from coordinating camps, running events, and doing church care. I've gotten a lot of experience not only from the projects, but also from the mentorship of fellow staff members. If you care about sharing the gospel with kids and training the next generation of leaders, Awana is the place to be.
cons: There's been some turnover of key leaders over the past years, which can affect the overall ministry. However, these changes don't affect the core ministry of reaching kids with the gospel through partnering with churches.

job_title: Director of Operations in Komoka, ON
pros: Transparent leadership through recent transition. Changes in team structure seem positive. Many opportunities to participate in growth. Very good at releasing team members to do their thing.
cons: Small team creates capacity issues. In the past, not very forward thinking.

review_title: Awana Canada is a great place to work!!
pros: Awesome team! And I love being apart of a ministry (not just a job) that I know is getting God's Word into children's hearts and minds and building God's Kingdom.
cons: Our team is spread across the country so it makes it a little difficult to connect more
